name: Heist (itch) (Justin)
description:
A 3D open-world bank robbery concept. Race against the clock as you pull of a heist!

The longer you play, the more you notice the world beginning to change. Take in the nostalgia of the 1950's as the world changes color.

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • SHIFT to run
  • Q to dive
